column2: the AIC is a lovely art museum with one of the most comprehensive collections I've ever seen. Down the street from the Monroe station
column3: this grand building houses collections on every medium from every era. With the Chicago Go Card
column4: you get fast pass access and it's definitely one of the best attractions in terms of value. They conveniently have a coat check which is great because you can easily spend half a day here! Exhibits of interest include:
